Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Predator Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A variant on the Rhino, the Predator battle tank is a vehicle of the Adeptus Astartes, providing a balance between firepower, speed, and expense. This design is armed with a high-explosive autocannon - with only a small blast radius but a good rate of fire - as well as two heavy bolters on each side. 

The Predator tank also dates back to the Dark Age of Technology, when humanity first encountered Orks. As the ancient humans required more firepower, they upgraded the armor and weapons of the Rhino, creating the first Predators. The autocannon could reliably penetrate Ork vehicle armor, and the Predatorâ€™s own armor could stand up to most Ork weaponry. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
